stages.description: You are ready for action! You eagerly brandish your flask of transformative elixir.
Your new experimental flask is ready to go. Your opponent won't know what hit her.
You're Liz Harper! This ignornant challenger has no idea what your scientific mind is capable of!
You step boldly into the arena, holding your latest creation. Today you'll collect the fool who thought they could challenge Liz Harper!
You step forward confidently, brandishing your flask and clipboard of notes. This challenge will be no sweat for a scientist like yourself.
The attack destroys your clothes, leaving you in just a tank and ripped shorts. Bothersome, but nothing you can't handle.
The attack leaves you in little more than your underwear. At least you can move around easily for now.
The attack destroys most of your clothes, but you're undeterred. You swivel around for a counterattack.
That villain destroyed your good lab coat! They'll pay for this!
Your clothes are ruined! You're unharmed, though, and have plenty of time to plan your next moves.
Crap! Your feet and calves are changing... turning to plastic!
Your feet and calves feel numb, and you glance down in irritation. You're turning to smooth, glossy plastic!
Oh no! Your body is transforming! Your legs are already half smooth, featureless plastic!
Your legs tingle, and you look back in alarm. You're turning to plastic!
Your body is almost transformed! You hold up your hands to defend yourself while you desperately try to think of something.
Oof! You feel the transformation overtaking you. If you don't come up with a way to win soon, you'll be entirely plastic!
Your body is almost turned to plastic, but you're not finished yet. You prepare your flask for a final ferocious attack.
The transformation is almost done, but there's fight left in you. You prepare to finish off your opponent before you become plastic.
Oh no! You're almost completely turned to plastic!
It's over. You are now just a plastic mannequin.
You lost! You are a helpless mannequin, still modeling your old clothes.
Your best just wasn't good enough, and as a result, you've been transformed into a pretty and useful plastic mannequin
Damn! You struggle, but the transformation overwhelms you. You are now a manneqin, helplessly modeling what's left of your clothes.
Before you can react, the transformation completes. You make an unusually posed, strikingly realistic mannequin.
